till fresh supply coming relief spaniard forced take shelter wall caused great consternation town many quitted post besieger laying hold opportunity laid ladder wall sea land besieged perceiving roman could enter camp reason rain fell asdrubal terrifyd misfortune fearing least ally desert already done following night quitted camp designing get away long march morning scipio perceiving gone popilius year consul q cecilius metellus sirnamd macedonicus came govern hispania citerior order quiet celtiberi instigation viriatus raising commotion account one quintius prosecuted war viriatus whether pretor commission consul appear certain viriatuss action quincius defeat worsted metellus subdues celtiberi quintius foot mount venus near ebora portugal gave viriatus great overthrow gathering force returned upon vigour victor receivd much damage tho middle autumn glad retire cordova winter fortified without taking care spaniard confederate roman weak garrison left exposed eminent danger metellus subdud celtiberi pliny say overcame arevaci nevertheless continued command year consul q fabius servilius sent viriatus foot horse besides force micipsa son massinissa sent elephant horse africk notwithstanding mighty army joynd roman pay viriatus lay hid mountain andaluzia frequent excursion great damage obtaind many advantage till roman removd camp vtica q fabius servilius consul streightens viriatus formerly city andaluzia viriatus want provision retird army lusitania consul rid danger marched cunei overcame two captain robber calld curio apuleyus carried town force held viriatus strong garrison great booty taken multitude prisoner whereof found guilty put death sold slave metellus time gaind much honour entirely reducing celtiberi taking famous city contrebia versobriga centobriga hearing consul quintus pompeius appointed succeed offended weaken force dismissed soldier neglected magazine starved elephant reason triumph otherwise well deservd refusd rome q pompeius came spain year servilianus continud order senate command receivd favour canoba captain robber submitted forced viriatus lay city vacia raise pompey spain siege fly away whereupon many neighbouring town submitted active vigilant le severe rather cruel cut hand canobas men prisoner deserted camp action stead terrifying native put upon desperate counsel roman laid siege city erisana viriatus without discovered got night next morning made furious sally put enemy flight killing many escaped drew place strength great viriatus defeat roman make peace em danger perishing viriatus laid hold opportunity obtain advantageous peace concluded virtue thereof roman savd life viriatus called friend people rome men plunderd allowd great shame dishonour majesty roman empire quintus pompeius held government hispania citerior two year province peace metellus left thing disorder opportunity action note contrary servilius order senate vacated peace made near city arsa put viriatus rout pursud servilius break peace rout viriatus carpetania stratagem got away drew men intending give battle placing horse front whilst roman forming body caused foot slip away thro wood near done horse swiftness got consul despairing taking subtle enemy marched vectones estremadura thence without stopping galicia disorder full murder robbery viriatus tired lasting war fearing men make peace price head sent three embassador treat consul mean chose secure provd ruin servilius corrupted embassador return murderd viriatus lay sleeping funeral honourd tear soldier afterwards sport death viriatus celtiberi remaind numantians termestini former treaty numantia revolt declard friend ally people rome consequently preservd liberty termestini supposd nine league numantia stand chappel calld lady sent embassador excuse pompey turned back disgrace still numantians sent others renouncing friendship segedani desiring renew peace alliance made gracchus pompey replyd vain treat peace unless laid arm hope accommodation thus numantians provided war effect raised foot horse small number great courage resolution megara man great experience appointed command men pompey idle incampd near numantia foot horse numantians kept continual alarm yet always avoided coming battle pompey perceiving sate termancia whence also forced retire great disorder sally besieged made next day came battle event whereof dubious pompey marched away city manlia delivered tho numantian garrison present neighbourhood town calld mallen perhaps remains city returned upon termancia took numantia remaind pompey movd towards slew tanginus captain robber men part country formerly edetani zaragoza done marched besieged pompey numantia siege like last long endeavourd turn away river duero provision might brought town forcd desist lost many men sally besiegd made besides killd tribune men guarded victualer forager pompey warnd loss kept men within work hardest season year caused many die sickness besides cut understood army roman army mutiny mutinied chosen one titus thorius chief therefore sent marcellus questor cordova quiet people defend town supposing thorius would march thither marcellus joyned spain rencounters marcellus could never deliver longinus siege till lepidus coming quieted thing marcellus referred determination difference longinus refusing permitted go whither would marcellus lepidus triumphed rome quieted commotion spain raised longinus marcellus banished mutinied soon pardoned thro mercy caesar spain divided faction betwixt caesar pompey many city sent embassador africk labienus remains pompey son spain army fleet gneius taken many town among rest cordova left brother sextus went besiege vlia held caesar quintus pedius quintus fabius maximus caesar lieutenant resorted thither refused coming battle protracted time till coming taken celebrating four triumph rome settling commonwealth delayed coming till beginning year setting rome made hast came saguntum monviedro day obulio called caesar return spain porcuna betwixt cordova jaen time battle fought sea betwixt didius caesar admiral varro commanded enemy loss equal varro showd worst putting port tarifa drawing chain cross mouth people cordova inclined caesar sent embassador shewing forcibly kept enemy advising town might easily surprized night vlia also sent embassador acquainting reduced great streights could long hold unless relieved caesar thus divided sent lucius junius paciecus six cohort assist vlia got town stormy night thro midst enemy saying sent pompey hope relieved incouraged among moor family almoravides got better alavecines moorish family almoravides come spain till held empire africk settled kingdom first part mauritania stretch along ocean mediterranean sea thence passd spain spread great part occasion coming thus king alonso marryd daughter moorish king sevil therefore request sent invite joseph tephin king almoravides africk assist fatherinlaw towards contrivance many sufferd estate charles fair king france navarre dyd bois de vincennes first february queen month death deliverd daughter calld blanch law france could inherit crown therefore occasion war betwixt france england son charles de valois dyed two year king calld philip cousin german three late king one side edward king england son lady elizabeth sister three king pretended crown state kingdom according salique law proclaimd philip de valois whence ensud bloody war betwixt two nation king england took title king france quarterd flower de luce arm navarre fortunate deliverd dominion greater moor assaild sea land king hasted towards xerez order news victory overtook accident causd battle given soon three ship left aground upon ebb moor attackd christian coming rescue bloody battle ensued chap v siege surrender algezira infidel attempt murder king alonso castile earl derby salisbury come assistance england earl faux france robert king naples dy late success made thing appear easy fleet lay port algezira besiegd xatarez near tarifa thither king went take view algezira sea finding beautiful spacious city captive also affirming ill provided corn resolvd lay siege force ut small store provision nevertheless calld together garisons neighbouring place summond many nobility attend council andaluzia furnishd usual quota towards war king went away sevil provide magazine horse foot gatherd set algezira third august galley castile aragon guard sea portugal victory gaudamecil returnd home town horse archer force great enough given battle open field made often salleys skirmishd various success yet tower cartagena near city taken one day king great danger killd captive struck dagger snatchd souldiers hand near interposd believd siege would last long therefore trench ast mean king great dissatisfaction september fleet aragon went away pretence war majorca yet soon upon king castile pressing instance galley sent aragonian viceadmiral mathew mercero jayme escrivia time died master santiago man great worth much king favour honour given camp frederick king son tho age october fell great rain camp spoild army labourd many hardship especially want mony kingdom exhausted king obligd borrow pope clement vith king france portugal king france lent ducat rest upon bill genoa pope gave part ecclesiastical revenue small sum yet king resolution overcame difficulty alvarez de toledo master santiago command sooner king peter gone burgos citizen sent invite count henry thither stild count offerd crown would take city according ancient custom accepted offer marchd thither crownd monastery huelgas example burgos city kingdom within day submitted thus power became equal adversary nobility commonalty striving gain favour new king affair castile leon setled removd galicia designd gather fleet order sail bayonne compostella causd suero archbishop see dean put death got together twenty two ship smaller vessel set sail france carrying son john two daughter beatrix de luna linkd together affection king castile alvaro de luna could live asunder notwithstanding account became odious particularly alvaro degree exceeded malice antient roman ever bore sejanus favourite emperor blind affection neither king took notice prejudicial familiarity alvaro sensible driving headlong ruin nothing pleasd king countenance ever smooth serene since alvaro removd commonly spoke day thought night courtier perceiving necessity alvaro must shortly restord power interest would much greater overcome malice enemy conquerd ill fortune made effort gain favour even king navarre envious brother prince henry greater interest king castile began favour alvaro sollicit might return court january dyd ruy lopez davalos valencia king aragon gentleman fortunate family davalos issue life three wife seven son two daughter italy descended earl potencia bovino marque del vasto pescara many honourable family spain body deposited valencia thence afterwards translated toledo buryd monastery st augustin usd give ear astrologer much addicted vain science yet could never foresee fall dyd altogether layd aside hope recovering estate prince henry aragon began labour bring fortune friend faild unfortuate ruy lopez alvar nunez de herrera fidelity servant citizen cordova steward time prosperity continud faithful till last cast prison accessary crime master accused soon dischargd joanna q naples dy beginning year body buryd little ceremony church annunciada death queen duke advancd interest aragon weakend french yet people naples without order consulting nobility proclaimd renee brother late duke king queen orderd little help expected prisoner marryd daughter duke lorrain dying without issuemale possessd dukedom antony earl vaudemont brother deceasd overthrew took victory moor action aragonians naples king aragon navarre taken genoese set liberty duke milan provd dangerous winter castile reason great rain road deep scarce travelling many building carryd away king ferdinand queen elizabeth war broke several part time villena dependency infested force kingdom valencia hereupon inhabitant city perswasion earl paredes took arm declared king ferdinand first capitulated ever incorporated crown castile cuidad reall recovered master calatrava possessed thereof without right arm great havock made party andaluzia galicia peter alvarado saved city tuy king portugal citizen burgos besieged castle city inigo de zuniga governor luis de acuna bishop held portuguese king called upon every side knew whither go first nobility failed supply men money provision people hated portuguese began grow weary war perceiving king ferdinand time broke castile scarce horse headed army horse foot king portugal marched first arevalo town thence went take possession toro samora king ferdinand marched encamped near toro enemy designing relieve castle still held action hapned betwixt king ferdinand sent challenge herald portugues answered force dispersed yet offered accept single combat therefore king ferdinand able relieve castle last surrendered provision money growing scarce returned medina del campo cortes assembled city granted towards carrying war half silver gold church provided engaged restore soon kingdom free war sent besiege castle burgos many said king ferdinand retired toro fear denoted ill posture affair certain moved archbishop toledo multitude especially phanatick moor among moor faithless disloyal changeable inclinable mutiny hate peace quietness upon small motif run sedition certain moor whose name yet known possessed fury quite distracted violent word ceased persuade people take arm preached harangued multitude corner street market loud voice horrid countenance manner stirred men take arm run like men sens cause discontent aimed unknown therefore remedy harder found boabdil called little king fearing would offer violence kept close within alhambra multitude furious first soon cool chiefly head consequently weak knew mind therefore next day king went albaizin people well affected towards assembled thought fit expostulated madness mutiniers shewing absolute necessity affection obliged capitulate enemy way left save city perishing sword famine word made calm people pacified many time sedition easily suppressed raised became moor caused mutiny known may imagined fled king boabdil warned danger past fearing expiration day agreed upon delivering city new trouble tumult might arise immediately sent letter king ferdinand present two choice horse cymiter furniture advertised hapned city people mutinied therefore inviting come take possession speedily lest delay might produce alteration short told since god ordained would next day deliver alhambra kingdom conqueror letter brought camp upon newyears ferdinand gone king emanuel begged queen motherinlaw let queen wife know thing went away ebora last acquainted death prince brother resented became loving sister parent bore loss great magnanimity kingdom naples yet peaceable prince salerno party mistrusting king fortified town castle first demonstration prince gave illwill tho appeared king frederick proclaimed naples yet would present coronation colour poverty however prince basiniano came court day following excuse intercede salerno mean peace prevailed king forced march army besiege strong town diano goncalo fernandez returning spain reckoning war naples end purpose gone calabria thence sicily came naples take leave king queen pressed aid siege defendant numerous king party favoured great captain gathered spaniard king furnishing german prince salerno expelled naples straitned besieged tho much danger person prince forced surrender agreed prince would follow might safely depart kingdom good town fort belonging france treat affair pretended revenue province allotted king france much le calabria apulia since recompence ought made demanded country capitanata yielded catholick king answered king france thought division equal would change province yet insisted upon equivalent made principality basilicata capitanata best part apulia reason rent short offered remit whole thing decision pope cardinal king france liked none proposal unwilling quit title king naples hierusalem exchanged threatned use force feud ran high one day told spanish ambassador king punctually observed agreed answered done defence assertion ready combat king spain king roman gralla replied king master prince world required ready make good field king france said king spain shall greater gralla answered greater king master true killed cannonball best gun dismounted discouraged moor third day surrendered spanish colour set upon wall fell fortunately first place fleet stayed ill weather upon news setting malaga great multitude
